subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks ring in the New Year in Los Angeles, after a Sunday matinee game against the Clippers. Regardless of the outcome, the Knicks will reach 2007 with a record below .500 and a rotation that remains in flux.
snippet: The Knicks ring in the New Year in Los Angeles, after a Sunday matinee game against the Clippers. Regardless of the outcome, the Knicks will reach 2007 with a record below .500 and a rotation that remains in flux.
